rows.label: tlk44500184_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome, travelers from afar! I
do hope your arrival here encourages
more outlanders to visit us.

rows.label: tlk44500184_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, I'd certainly be happy
about it, but I'm not sure how
well the others would take it...

rows.label: tlk44500184_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Some of us here think that having
relations with the outside world makes
us more susceptible to being invaded.

rows.label: tlk44500184_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I just hope our country's heading
in the right direction...
